#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>


typedef long long int ll;

using namespace std;
char arr[5000];
int main()
{
    ll n,t;
    scanf("%lld",&n);

    while(n--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&t);
        strcpy(arr,"1");
        int carry=0,temp=0,i=0,cnt=0,num=t,sum=0;

        while(num>0)
        {
            cnt++;
            num/=10;
        }

        while(t--)
        {
           carry=0;
           temp=0;
           for(i=0;arr[i];i++)
           {
            temp=(arr[i]-'0')*2+carry;
            carry=temp/10;
            temp=temp%10;
            arr[i]=temp+'0';
           }
           if(carry!=0)
            {arr[i]=carry+'0';i++;}

           arr[i]='\0';
        }

        for(int i=0;arr[i];i++)
              {if(arr[i]>='0'&&arr[i]<='9'){sum=sum+arr[i]-'0';}}
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
